scripts.say: This is Enterprise. Fleet has arrived safely at the rendezvous point. Good work, everyone.
Yo, Denver! Good to see you again!
As you probably saw, these Sirens don't fight so good, but they do have numbers on their side. Clearing all of 'em out is gonna take some time.
So, time to head to the AO, right?
Yeah, but there's been a change of plans. Higher-ups gave us a special mission; we'll be doing reconnaissance in Siren territory.
They said they already informed the Commander about it, so everything should be in order.
Sounds good to me! Besides, we'd surely grow rusty if we just fight these scrub Sirens all day.
Cleve! I brought you extra supplies! Oh, and a gift from Denver as well!
Really? Nice! I was just feeling a bit hungry, actually. Cheers! Om nom nom...
All right, let's do this! With the combined power of Enterprise and the Knights of the Sea, we're unstoppable!
